@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
  .fa-beat,
.fa-bounce,
.fa-fade,
.fa-beat-fade,
.fa-flip,
.fa-pulse,
.fa-shake,
.fa-spin,
.fa-spin-pulse {
    animation-delay: -1ms;
    animation-duration: 1ms;
    animation-iteration-count: 1;
    transition-delay: 0s;
    transition-duration: 0s;
  }
}
@keyframes fa-beat {
  0%, 90% {
    transform: scale(1);
  }
  45% {
    transform: scale(var(--fa-beat-scale, 1.25));
  }
}
@keyframes fa-bounce {
  0% {
    transform: scale(1, 1) translateY(0);
  }
  10% {
    transform: scale(var(--fa-bounce-start-scale-x, 1.1), var(--fa-bounce-start-scale-y, 0.9)) translateY(0);
  }
  30% {
    transform: scale(var(--fa-bounce-jump-scale-x, 0.9), var(--fa-bounce-jump-scale-y, 1.1)) translateY(var(--fa-bounce-height, -0.5em));
  }
  50% {
    transform: scale(var(--fa-bounce-land-scale-x, 1.05), var(--fa-bounce-land-scale-y, 0.95)) translateY(0);
  }
  57% {
    transform: scale(1, 1) translateY(var(--fa-bounce-rebound, -0.125em));
  }
  64% {
    transform: scale(1, 1) translateY(0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: scale(1, 1) translateY(0);
  }
}
@keyframes fa-fade {
  50% {
    opacity: var(--fa-fade-opacity, 0.4);
  }
}
@keyframes fa-beat-fade {
  0%, 100% {
    opacity: var(--fa-beat-fade-opacity, 0.4);
    transform: scale(1);
  }
  50% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale(var(--fa-beat-fade-scale, 1.125));
  }
}
@keyframes fa-flip {
  50% {

  }
}

    transform: rotate(-15deg);

    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
}

  0% {
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  100% {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

t=new IntersectionObserver(e=>{e.forEach(e=>{if(e.isIntersecting){const n=e.target;t.unobserve(n),v(n.href)}})});document.querySelectorAll("a").forEach(e=>{h(e)&&t.observe(e)})})}}function p(e){e.relatedTarget&&e.target.closest("a")==e.relatedTarget.closest("a")||t&&(clearTimeout(t),t=void 0)}function h(t){if(t&&t.href&&(!r||"instant"in t.dataset)&&(a||t.origin==location.origin||"instant"in t.dataset)&&["http:","https:"].includes(t.protocol)&&("http:"!=t.protocol||"https:"!=location.protocol)&&(s||!t.search||"instant"in t.dataset)&&!(t.hash&&t.pathname+t.search==location.pathname+location.search||"noInstant"in t.dataset))return!0}function v(t){if(n.has(t))return;const e=document.createElement("link");e.rel="prefetch",e.href=t,document.head.appendChild(e),n.add(t)}</script><script id="ethicaladsjs" type="text/javascript" async="true" src="./1_files/ethicalads.min.js.download"></script><link rel="prefetch" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><link rel="prefetch" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_signal.html"><link rel="prefetch" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedint32array.html"><link rel="prefetch" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/index.html#editor-only"><link rel="prefetch" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/index.html"></head>

</ul>
</li>
<li class="toctree-l3"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/tutorials/xr/openxr_body_tracking.html"><button class="toctree-expand" title="Open/close menu"></button>OpenXR body tracking</a><ul>

</ul>
</li>

      </p>

  <section id="string">
<span id="class-string"></span><h1>String<a class="headerlink" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#string" title="Permalink to this headline">Â¶</a></h1>
<p>A built-in type for strings.</p>
<section class="classref-introduction-group" id="description">
<h2>Description<a class="headerlink" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#description" title="Permalink to this headline">Â¶</a></h2>
<p>This is the built-in string Variant type (and the one used by GDScript). Strings may contain any number of Unicode characters, and expose methods useful for manipulating and generating strings. Strings are reference-counted and use a copy-on-write approach (every modification to a string returns a new <strong>String</strong>), so passing them around is cheap in resources.</p>
<p>Some string methods have corresponding variations. Variations suffixed with <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">n</span></code> (<a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-countn"><span class="std std-ref">countn</span></a>, <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-findn"><span class="std std-ref">findn</span></a>, <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-replacen"><span class="std std-ref">replacen</span></a>, etc.) are <strong>case-insensitive</strong> (they make no distinction between uppercase and lowercase letters). Method variations prefixed with <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">r</span></code> (<a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-rfind"><span class="std std-ref">rfind</span></a>, <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-rsplit"><span class="std std-ref">rsplit</span></a>, etc.) are reversed, and start from the end of the string, instead of the beginning.</p>
<p><strong>Note:</strong> In a boolean context, a string will evaluate to <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">false</span></code> if it is empty (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">""</span></code>). Otherwise, a string will always evaluate to <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code>. The <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">not</span></code> operator cannot be used. Instead, <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-empty"><span class="std std-ref">is_empty</span></a> should be used to check for empty strings.</p>
<div class="admonition note">
<p class="admonition-title">Note</p>
<p>There are notable differences when using this API with C#. See <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/tutorials/scripting/c_sharp/c_sharp_differences.html#doc-c-sharp-differences"><span class="std std-ref">C# API differences to GDScript</span></a> for more information.</p>
</div>
</section>
<section class="classref-introduction-group" id="tutorials">
<h2>Tutorials<a class="headerlink" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#tutorials" title="Permalink to this headline">Â¶</a></h2>
<ul class="simple">
<li><p><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/tutorials/scripting/gdscript/gdscript_format_string.html"><span class="doc">GDScript format strings</span></a></p></li>
</ul>
</section>

<section class="classref-reftable-group" id="methods">
<h2>Methods<a class="headerlink" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#methods" title="Permalink to this headline">Â¶</a></h2>
<div class="wy-table-responsive"><table class="colwidths-auto docutils align-default">
<tbody>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><p><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a></p></td>
<td><p><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-begins-with"><span class="std std-ref">begins_with</span></a>(text: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr></p></td>
</tr>

</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><p><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a></p></td>

<section class="classref-descriptions-group" id="constructor-descriptions">
<h2>Constructor Descriptions<a class="headerlink" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#constructor-descriptions" title="Permalink to this headline">Â¶</a></h2>
<p class="classref-constructor" id="class-string-constructor-string"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>String</strong>() <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-constructor-string"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Constructs an empty <strong>String</strong> (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">""</span></code>).</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-constructor"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>String</strong>(from: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>)</p>
<p>Constructs a <strong>String</strong> as a copy of the given <strong>String</strong>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-constructor"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>String</strong>(from: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_nodepath.html#class-nodepath"><span class="std std-ref">NodePath</span></a>)</p>
<p>Constructs a new <strong>String</strong> from the given <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_nodepath.html#class-nodepath"><span class="std std-ref">NodePath</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-constructor"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>String</strong>(from: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_stringname.html#class-stringname"><span class="std std-ref">StringName</span></a>)</p>
<p>Constructs a new <strong>String</strong> from the given <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_stringname.html#class-stringname"><span class="std std-ref">StringName</span></a>.</p>
</section>

<section class="classref-descriptions-group" id="method-descriptions">
<h2>Method Descriptions<a class="headerlink" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#method-descriptions" title="Permalink to this headline">Â¶</a></h2>
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-begins-with"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>begins_with</strong>(text: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-begins-with"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if the string begins with the given <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">text</span></code>. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-ends-with"><span class="std std-ref">ends_with</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-bigrams"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedstringarray.html#class-packedstringarray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedStringArray</span></a> <strong>bigrams</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-bigrams"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns an array containing the bigrams (pairs of consecutive characters) of this string.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell0"><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Get up!"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">bigrams</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints ["Ge", "et", "t ", " u", "up", "p!"]</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell0">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>

    </button></div>
</div>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-bin-to-int"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>bin_to_int</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-bin-to-int"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Converts the string representing a binary number into an <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>. The string may optionally be prefixed with <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"0b"</span></code>, and an additional <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-</span></code> prefix for negative numbers.</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-0-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-0-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" name="R0RTY3JpcHQ=" role="tab" tabindex="0">GDScript</button><button aria-controls="panel-0-QyM=" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-0-QyM=" name="QyM=" role="tab" tabindex="-1">C#</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-0-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-0-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" name="R0RTY3JpcHQ=" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell1"><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"101"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">bin_to_int</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="c1"># Prints 5</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"0b101"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">bin_to_int</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints 5</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"-0b10"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">bin_to_int</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints -2</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell1">

  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>

<span class="n">GD</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"0b101"</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">BinToInt</span><span class="p">());</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">// Prints 5</span>
<span class="n">GD</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"-0b10"</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">BinToInt</span><span class="p">());</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">// Prints -2</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell2">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">

<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-c-escape"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>c_escape</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-c-escape"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns a copy of the string with special characters escaped using the C language standard.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-c-unescape"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>c_unescape</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-c-unescape"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns a copy of the string with escaped characters replaced by their meanings. Supported escape sequences are <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">\'</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">\"</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">\\</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">\a</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">\b</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">\f</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">\n</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">\r</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">\t</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">\v</span></code>.</p>
<p><strong>Note:</strong> Unlike the GDScript parser, this method doesn't support the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">\uXXXX</span></code> escape sequence.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-capitalize"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>capitalize</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-capitalize"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Changes the appearance of the string: replaces underscores (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">_</span></code>) with spaces, adds spaces before uppercase letters in the middle of a word, converts all letters to lowercase, then converts the first one and each one following a space to uppercase.</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-1-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-1-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" name="R0RTY3JpcHQ=" role="tab" tabindex="0">GDScript</button><button aria-controls="panel-1-QyM=" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-1-QyM=" name="QyM=" role="tab" tabindex="-1">C#</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-1-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-1-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" name="R0RTY3JpcHQ=" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell3"><span></span><span class="s2">"move_local_x"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">capitalize</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="c1"># Returns "Move Local X"</span>
<span class="s2">"sceneFile_path"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">capitalize</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Returns "Scene File Path"</span>
<span class="s2">"2D, FPS, PNG"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">capitalize</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="c1"># Returns "2d, Fps, Png"</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell3">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-1-QyM=" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-1-QyM=" name="QyM=" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-csharp notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell4"><span></span><span class="s">"move_local_x"</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Capitalize</span><span class="p">();</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="c1">// Returns "Move Local X"</span>
<span class="s">"sceneFile_path"</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Capitalize</span><span class="p">();</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">// Returns "Scene File Path"</span>
<span class="s">"2D, FPS, PNG"</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Capitalize</span><span class="p">();</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="c1">// Returns "2d, Fps, Png"</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell4">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>
</div>
</div></div>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-casecmp-to"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>casecmp_to</strong>(to: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-casecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Performs a case-sensitive comparison to another string. Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-1</span></code> if less than, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">1</span></code> if greater than, or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">0</span></code> if equal. "Less than" and "greater than" are determined by the <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Unicode_characters">Unicode code points</a> of each string, which roughly matches the alphabetical order.</p>
<p>With different string lengths, returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">1</span></code> if this string is longer than the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">to</span></code> string, or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-1</span></code> if shorter. Note that the length of empty strings is <em>always</em> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">0</span></code>.</p>
<p>To get a <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> result from a string comparison, use the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">==</span></code> operator instead. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-nocasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">nocasecmp_to</span></a>, <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-filecasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">filecasecmp_to</span></a>, and <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-naturalcasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">naturalcasecmp_to</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-chr"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>chr</strong>(char: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>) <abbr title="This method doesn&#39;t need an instance to be called, so it can be called directly using the class name.">static</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-chr"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns a single Unicode character from the decimal <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">char</span></code>. You may use <a class="reference external" href="https://unicodelookup.com/">unicodelookup.com</a> or <a class="reference external" href="https://www.unicode.org/charts/">unicode.org</a> as points of reference.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell5"><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb nb-Type">String</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">chr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">65</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w">     </span><span class="c1"># Prints "A"</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb nb-Type">String</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">chr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">129302</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints "ðŸ¤–" (robot face emoji)</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell5">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>

</div>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-contains"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>contains</strong>(what: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-contains"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if the string contains <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">what</span></code>. In GDScript, this corresponds to the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">in</span></code> operator.</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-2-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-2-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" name="R0RTY3JpcHQ=" role="tab" tabindex="0">GDScript</button><button aria-controls="panel-2-QyM=" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-2-QyM=" name="QyM=" role="tab" tabindex="-1">C#</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-2-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-2-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" name="R0RTY3JpcHQ=" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell6"><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Node"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">contains</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"de"</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints true</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"team"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">contains</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"I"</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w">  </span><span class="c1"># Prints false</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"I"</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="ow">in</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"team"</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w">         </span><span class="c1"># Prints false</span>

<p>If you need to know where <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">what</span></code> is within the string, use <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-find"><span class="std std-ref">find</span></a>. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-containsn"><span class="std std-ref">containsn</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-containsn"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>containsn</strong>(what: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-containsn"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if the string contains <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">what</span></code>, <strong>ignoring case</strong>.</p>
<p>If you need to know where <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">what</span></code> is within the string, use <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-findn"><span class="std std-ref">findn</span></a>. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-contains"><span class="std std-ref">contains</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-count"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>count</strong>(what: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>, from: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> = 0, to: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> = 0) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-count"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the number of occurrences of the substring <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">what</span></code> between <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">from</span></code> and <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">to</span></code> positions. If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">to</span></code> is 0, the search continues until the end of the string.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-countn"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>countn</strong>(what: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>, from: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> = 0, to: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> = 0) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-countn"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the number of occurrences of the substring <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">what</span></code> between <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">from</span></code> and <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">to</span></code> positions, <strong>ignoring case</strong>. If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">to</span></code> is 0, the search continues until the end of the string.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-dedent"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>dedent</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-dedent"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns a copy of the string with indentation (leading tabs and spaces) removed. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-indent"><span class="std std-ref">indent</span></a> to add indentation.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-ends-with"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>ends_with</strong>(text: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-ends-with"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if the string ends with the given <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">text</span></code>. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-begins-with"><span class="std std-ref">begins_with</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-erase"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>erase</strong>(position: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>, chars: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> = 1) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-erase"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns a string with <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">chars</span></code> characters erased starting from <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">position</span></code>. If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">chars</span></code> goes beyond the string's length given the specified <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">position</span></code>, fewer characters will be erased from the returned string. Returns an empty string if either <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">position</span></code> or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">chars</span></code> is negative. Returns the original string unmodified if <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">chars</span></code> is <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">0</span></code>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-filecasecmp-to"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>filecasecmp_to</strong>(to: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-filecasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Like <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-naturalcasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">naturalcasecmp_to</span></a> but prioritizes strings that begin with periods (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">.</span></code>) and underscores (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">_</span></code>) before any other character. Useful when sorting folders or file names.</p>
<p>To get a <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> result from a string comparison, use the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">==</span></code> operator instead. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-filenocasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">filenocasecmp_to</span></a>, <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-naturalcasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">naturalcasecmp_to</span></a>, and <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-casecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">casecmp_to</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-filenocasecmp-to"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>filenocasecmp_to</strong>(to: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-filenocasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Like <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-naturalnocasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">naturalnocasecmp_to</span></a> but prioritizes strings that begin with periods (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">.</span></code>) and underscores (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">_</span></code>) before any other character. Useful when sorting folders or file names.</p>
<p>To get a <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> result from a string comparison, use the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">==</span></code> operator instead. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-filecasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">filecasecmp_to</span></a>, <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-naturalnocasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">naturalnocasecmp_to</span></a>, and <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-nocasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">nocasecmp_to</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-find"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>find</strong>(what: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>, from: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> = 0) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-find"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the index of the <strong>first</strong> occurrence of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">what</span></code> in this string, or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-1</span></code> if there are none. The search's start can be specified with <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">from</span></code>, continuing to the end of the string.</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-3-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-3-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" name="R0RTY3JpcHQ=" role="tab" tabindex="0">GDScript</button><button aria-controls="panel-3-QyM=" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-3-QyM=" name="QyM=" role="tab" tabindex="-1">C#</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-3-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-3-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" name="R0RTY3JpcHQ=" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell8"><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Team"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">find</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"I"</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints -1</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Potato"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">find</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"t"</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w">    </span><span class="c1"># Prints 2</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Potato"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">find</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"t"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints 4</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Potato"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">find</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"t"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints -1</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell8">

</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-3-QyM=" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-3-QyM=" name="QyM=" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-csharp notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell9"><span></span><span class="n">GD</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"Team"</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Find</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"I"</span><span class="p">));</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">// Prints -1</span>

<span class="n">GD</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"Potato"</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Find</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"t"</span><span class="p">));</span><span class="w">    </span><span class="c1">// Prints 2</span>
<span class="n">GD</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"Potato"</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Find</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"t"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="m">3</span><span class="p">));</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">// Prints 4</span>
<span class="n">GD</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"Potato"</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Find</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"t"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="m">5</span><span class="p">));</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">// Prints -1</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell9">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>

</div>
</div></div>
<p><strong>Note:</strong> If you just want to know whether the string contains <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">what</span></code>, use <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-contains"><span class="std std-ref">contains</span></a>. In GDScript, you may also use the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">in</span></code> operator.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-findn"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>findn</strong>(what: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>, from: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> = 0) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-findn"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the index of the <strong>first</strong> <strong>case-insensitive</strong> occurrence of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">what</span></code> in this string, or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-1</span></code> if there are none. The starting search index can be specified with <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">from</span></code>, continuing to the end of the string.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-format"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>format</strong>(values: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_variant.html#class-variant"><span class="std std-ref">Variant</span></a>, placeholder: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> = "{_}") <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-format"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Formats the string by replacing all occurrences of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">placeholder</span></code> with the elements of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">values</span></code>.</p>
<p><code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">values</span></code> can be a <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_dictionary.html#class-dictionary"><span class="std std-ref">Dictionary</span></a> or an <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_array.html#class-array"><span class="std std-ref">Array</span></a>. Any underscores in <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">placeholder</span></code> will be replaced with the corresponding keys in advance. Array elements use their index as keys.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell10"><span></span><span class="c1"># Prints "Waiting for Godot is a play by Samuel Beckett, and Godot Engine is named after it."</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">use_array_values</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Waiting for {0} is a play by {1}, and {0} Engine is named after it."</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">use_array_values</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s2">"Godot"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Samuel Beckett"</span><span class="p">]))</span>

<span class="c1"># Prints "User 42 is Godot."</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"User {id} is {name}."</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="s2">"id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">42</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"name"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Godot"</span><span class="p">}))</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell10">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>
</div>
<p>Some additional handling is performed when <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">values</span></code> is an <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_array.html#class-array"><span class="std std-ref">Array</span></a>. If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">placeholder</span></code> does not contain an underscore, the elements of the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">values</span></code> array will be used to replace one occurrence of the placeholder in order; If an element of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">values</span></code> is another 2-element array, it'll be interpreted as a key-value pair.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell11"><span></span><span class="c1"># Prints "User 42 is Godot."</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"User {} is {}."</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="mi">42</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Godot"</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"{}"</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"User {id} is {name}."</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">([[</span><span class="s2">"id"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">42</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"name"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Godot"</span><span class="p">]]))</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell11">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>
</div>
<p>See also the <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/tutorials/scripting/gdscript/gdscript_format_string.html"><span class="doc">GDScript format string</span></a> tutorial.</p>
<p><strong>Note:</strong> The replacement of placeholders is not done all at once, instead each placeholder is replaced in the order they are passed, this means that if one of the replacement strings contains a key it will also be replaced. This can be very powerful, but can also cause unexpected results if you are not careful. If you do not need to perform replacement in the replacement strings, make sure your replacements do not contain placeholders to ensure reliable results.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell12"><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"{0} {1}"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s2">"{1}"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"x"</span><span class="p">]))</span><span class="w">                       </span><span class="c1"># Prints "x x".</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"{0} {1}"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s2">"x"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"{0}"</span><span class="p">]))</span><span class="w">                       </span><span class="c1"># Prints "x {0}".</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"{foo} {bar}"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="s2">"foo"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"{bar}"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"bar"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"baz"</span><span class="p">}))</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints "baz baz".</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"{foo} {bar}"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="s2">"bar"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"baz"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"foo"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"{bar}"</span><span class="p">}))</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints "{bar} baz".</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell12">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>
</div>
<p><strong>Note:</strong> In C#, it's recommended to <a class="reference external" href="https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/tokens/interpolated">interpolate strings with "$"</a>, instead.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-get-base-dir"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>get_base_dir</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-get-base-dir"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>If the string is a valid file path, returns the base directory name.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell13"><span></span><span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">dir_path</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"/path/to/file.txt"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_base_dir</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># dir_path is "/path/to"</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell13">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>

<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-get-basename"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>get_basename</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-get-basename"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>If the string is a valid file path, returns the full file path, without the extension.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell14"><span></span><span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">base</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"/path/to/file.txt"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_basename</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># base is "/path/to/file"</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell14">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>
</div>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-get-extension"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>get_extension</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-get-extension"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>If the string is a valid file name or path, returns the file extension without the leading period (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">.</span></code>). Otherwise, returns an empty string.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell15"><span></span><span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">a</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"/path/to/file.txt"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_extension</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># a is "txt"</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">b</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"cool.txt"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_extension</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w">          </span><span class="c1"># b is "txt"</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">c</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"cool.font.tres"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_extension</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w">    </span><span class="c1"># c is "tres"</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">d</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">".pack1"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_extension</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w">            </span><span class="c1"># d is "pack1"</span>

<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">e</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"file.txt."</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_extension</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w">  </span><span class="c1"># e is ""</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">f</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"file.txt.."</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_extension</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># f is ""</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">g</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"txt"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_extension</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w">        </span><span class="c1"># g is ""</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">h</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">""</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_extension</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w">           </span><span class="c1"># h is ""</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell15">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>
</div>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-get-file"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>get_file</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-get-file"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>If the string is a valid file path, returns the file name, including the extension.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell16"><span></span><span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">file</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"/path/to/icon.png"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_file</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># file is "icon.png"</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell16">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>
</div>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-get-slice"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>get_slice</strong>(delimiter: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>, slice: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-get-slice"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Splits the string using a <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">delimiter</span></code> and returns the substring at index <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">slice</span></code>. Returns the original string if <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">delimiter</span></code> does not occur in the string. Returns an empty string if the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">slice</span></code> does not exist.</p>
<p>This is faster than <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-split"><span class="std std-ref">split</span></a>, if you only need one substring.</p>
<p><strong>Example:</strong></p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell17"><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"i/am/example/hi"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_slice</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"/"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints "example"</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell17">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>
</div>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-get-slice-count"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>get_slice_count</strong>(delimiter: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-get-slice-count"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the total number of slices when the string is split with the given <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">delimiter</span></code> (see <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-split"><span class="std std-ref">split</span></a>).</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-get-slicec"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>get_slicec</strong>(delimiter: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>, slice: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-get-slicec"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Splits the string using a Unicode character with code <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">delimiter</span></code> and returns the substring at index <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">slice</span></code>. Returns an empty string if the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">slice</span></code> does not exist.</p>
<p>This is faster than <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-split"><span class="std std-ref">split</span></a>, if you only need one substring.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-hash"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>hash</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-hash"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the 32-bit hash value representing the string's contents.</p>
<p><strong>Note:</strong> Strings with equal hash values are <em>not</em> guaranteed to be the same, as a result of hash collisions. On the contrary, strings with different hash values are guaranteed to be different.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-hex-decode"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray</span></a> <strong>hex_decode</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-hex-decode"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Decodes a hexadecimal string as a <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray</span></a>.</p>
