<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-hex-to-int"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>hex_to_int</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-hex-to-int"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Converts the string representing a hexadecimal number into an <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>. The string may be optionally prefixed with <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"0x"</span></code>, and an additional <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-</span></code> prefix for negative numbers.</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-5-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-5-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" name="R0RTY3JpcHQ=" role="tab" tabindex="0">GDScript</button><button aria-controls="panel-5-QyM=" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-5-QyM=" name="QyM=" role="tab" tabindex="-1">C#</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-5-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-5-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" name="R0RTY3JpcHQ=" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell20"><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"0xff"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">hex_to_int</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints 255</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"ab"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">hex_to_int</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="c1"># Prints 171</span>

</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-5-QyM=" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-5-QyM=" name="QyM=" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-csharp notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell21"><span></span><span class="n">GD</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"0xff"</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">HexToInt</span><span class="p">());</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">// Prints 255</span>

<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-humanize-size"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>humanize_size</strong>(size: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>) <abbr title="This method doesn&#39;t need an instance to be called, so it can be called directly using the class name.">static</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-humanize-size"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Converts <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">size</span></code> which represents a number of bytes into a human-readable form.</p>
<p>The result is in <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Binary_prefix#IEC_prefixes">IEC prefix format</a>, which may end in either <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"B"</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"KiB"</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"MiB"</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"GiB"</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"TiB"</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"PiB"</span></code>, or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"EiB"</span></code>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-indent"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>indent</strong>(prefix: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-indent"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Indents every line of the string with the given <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">prefix</span></code>. Empty lines are not indented. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-dedent"><span class="std std-ref">dedent</span></a> to remove indentation.</p>
<p>For example, the string can be indented with two tabulations using <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"\t\t"</span></code>, or four spaces using <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <span class="pre">"</span></code>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-insert"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>insert</strong>(position: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>, what: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-insert"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Inserts <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">what</span></code> at the given <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">position</span></code> in the string.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-is-absolute-path"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>is_absolute_path</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-absolute-path"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if the string is a path to a file or directory, and its starting point is explicitly defined. This method is the opposite of <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-relative-path"><span class="std std-ref">is_relative_path</span></a>.</p>
<p>This includes all paths starting with <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"res://"</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"user://"</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"C:\"</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"/"</span></code>, etc.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-is-empty"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>is_empty</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-empty"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if the string's length is <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">0</span></code> (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">""</span></code>). See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-length"><span class="std std-ref">length</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-is-relative-path"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>is_relative_path</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-relative-path"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if the string is a path, and its starting point is dependent on context. The path could begin from the current directory, or the current <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_node.html#class-node"><span class="std std-ref">Node</span></a> (if the string is derived from a <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_nodepath.html#class-nodepath"><span class="std std-ref">NodePath</span></a>), and may sometimes be prefixed with <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"./"</span></code>. This method is the opposite of <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-absolute-path"><span class="std std-ref">is_absolute_path</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-is-subsequence-of"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>is_subsequence_of</strong>(text: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-subsequence-of"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if all characters of this string can be found in <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">text</span></code> in their original order.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell22"><span></span><span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">text</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Wow, incredible!"</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"inedible"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_subsequence_of</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints true</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Word!"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_subsequence_of</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w">    </span><span class="c1"># Prints true</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Window"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_subsequence_of</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="c1"># Prints false</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">""</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_subsequence_of</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w">         </span><span class="c1"># Prints true</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell22">

  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>

<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-is-subsequence-ofn"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>is_subsequence_ofn</strong>(text: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-subsequence-ofn"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if all characters of this string can be found in <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">text</span></code> in their original order, <strong>ignoring case</strong>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-is-valid-filename"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>is_valid_filename</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-valid-filename"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if this string does not contain characters that are not allowed in file names (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">:</span></code> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">/</span></code> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">\</span></code> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">?</span></code> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">*</span></code> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"</span></code> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">|</span></code> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">%</span></code> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">&lt;</span></code> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">&gt;</span></code>).</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-is-valid-float"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>is_valid_float</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-valid-float"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if this string represents a valid floating-point number. A valid float may contain only digits, one decimal point (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">.</span></code>), and the exponent letter (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">e</span></code>). It may also be prefixed with a positive (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">+</span></code>) or negative (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-</span></code>) sign. Any valid integer is also a valid float (see <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-valid-int"><span class="std std-ref">is_valid_int</span></a>). See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-to-float"><span class="std std-ref">to_float</span></a>.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell23"><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"1.7"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_valid_float</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="c1"># Prints true</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"24"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_valid_float</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w">    </span><span class="c1"># Prints true</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"7e3"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_valid_float</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="c1"># Prints true</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Hello"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_valid_float</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints false</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell23">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>

</div>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-is-valid-hex-number"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>is_valid_hex_number</strong>(with_prefix: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> = false) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-valid-hex-number"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if this string is a valid hexadecimal number. A valid hexadecimal number only contains digits or letters <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">A</span></code> to <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">F</span></code> (either uppercase or lowercase), and may be prefixed with a positive (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">+</span></code>) or negative (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-</span></code>) sign.</p>
<p>If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">with_prefix</span></code> is <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code>, the hexadecimal number needs to prefixed by <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"0x"</span></code> to be considered valid.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell24"><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"A08E"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_valid_hex_number</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w">    </span><span class="c1"># Prints true</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"-AbCdEf"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_valid_hex_number</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints true</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"2.5"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_valid_hex_number</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w">     </span><span class="c1"># Prints false</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"0xDEADC0DE"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_valid_hex_number</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">true</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints true</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell24">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>
</div>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-is-valid-html-color"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>is_valid_html_color</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-valid-html-color"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if this string is a valid color in hexadecimal HTML notation. The string must be a hexadecimal value (see <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-valid-hex-number"><span class="std std-ref">is_valid_hex_number</span></a>) of either 3, 4, 6 or 8 digits, and may be prefixed by a hash sign (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">#</span></code>). Other HTML notations for colors, such as names or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">hsl()</span></code>, are not considered valid. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_color.html#class-color-method-html"><span class="std std-ref">Color.html</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-is-valid-identifier"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>is_valid_identifier</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-valid-identifier"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if this string is a valid identifier. A valid identifier may contain only letters, digits and underscores (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">_</span></code>), and the first character may not be a digit.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell25"><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"node_2d"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_valid_identifier</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w">    </span><span class="c1"># Prints true</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"TYPE_FLOAT"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_valid_identifier</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints true</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"1st_method"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_valid_identifier</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints false</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"MyMethod#2"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_valid_identifier</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints false</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell25">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">

  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>

<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-is-valid-int"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>is_valid_int</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-valid-int"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if this string represents a valid integer. A valid integer only contains digits, and may be prefixed with a positive (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">+</span></code>) or negative (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-</span></code>) sign. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-to-int"><span class="std std-ref">to_int</span></a>.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell26"><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"7"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_valid_int</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w">    </span><span class="c1"># Prints true</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"1.65"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_valid_int</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints false</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Hi"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_valid_int</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="c1"># Prints false</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"+3"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_valid_int</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="c1"># Prints true</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"-12"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">is_valid_int</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w">  </span><span class="c1"># Prints true</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell26">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>

<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-is-valid-ip-address"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>is_valid_ip_address</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-valid-ip-address"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if this string represents a well-formatted IPv4 or IPv6 address. This method considers <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reserved_IP_addresses">reserved IP addresses</a> such as <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"0.0.0.0"</span></code> and <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff"</span></code> as valid.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-join"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>join</strong>(parts: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedstringarray.html#class-packedstringarray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedStringArray</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-join"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the concatenation of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">parts</span></code>' elements, with each element separated by the string calling this method. This method is the opposite of <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-split"><span class="std std-ref">split</span></a>.</p>
<p><strong>Example:</strong></p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-6-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-6-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" name="R0RTY3JpcHQ=" role="tab" tabindex="0">GDScript</button><button aria-controls="panel-6-QyM=" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-6-QyM=" name="QyM=" role="tab" tabindex="-1">C#</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-6-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-6-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" name="R0RTY3JpcHQ=" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell27"><span></span><span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">fruits</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Apple"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Orange"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Pear"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Kiwi"</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">", "</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">join</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fruits</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w">  </span><span class="c1"># Prints "Apple, Orange, Pear, Kiwi"</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"---"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">join</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fruits</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints "Apple---Orange---Pear---Kiwi"</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell27">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>

</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-6-QyM=" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-6-QyM=" name="QyM=" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-csharp notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell28"><span></span><span class="kt">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">fruits</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="k">new</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kt">string</span><span class="p">[]</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s">"Apple"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s">"Orange"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s">"Pear"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s">"Kiwi"</span><span class="p">};</span>

<span class="c1">// In C#, this method is static.</span>
<span class="n">GD</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">string</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Join</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">", "</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">fruits</span><span class="p">));</span><span class="w">  </span><span class="c1">// Prints "Apple, Orange, Pear, Kiwi"</span>
<span class="n">GD</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">string</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Join</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"---"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">fruits</span><span class="p">));</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">// Prints "Apple---Orange---Pear---Kiwi"</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell28">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>

<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-json-escape"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>json_escape</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-json-escape"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns a copy of the string with special characters escaped using the JSON standard. Because it closely matches the C standard, it is possible to use <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-c-unescape"><span class="std std-ref">c_unescape</span></a> to unescape the string, if necessary.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-left"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>left</strong>(length: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-left"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the first <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">length</span></code> characters from the beginning of the string. If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">length</span></code> is negative, strips the last <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">length</span></code> characters from the string's end.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell29"><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Hello World!"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">left</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w">  </span><span class="c1"># Prints "Hel"</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Hello World!"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">left</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints "Hello Wo"</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell29">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>

<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-length"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>length</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-length"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the number of characters in the string. Empty strings (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">""</span></code>) always return <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">0</span></code>. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-empty"><span class="std std-ref">is_empty</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-lpad"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>lpad</strong>(min_length: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>, character: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> = " ") <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-lpad"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Formats the string to be at least <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">min_length</span></code> long by adding <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">character</span></code>s to the left of the string, if necessary. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-rpad"><span class="std std-ref">rpad</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-lstrip"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>lstrip</strong>(chars: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-lstrip"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Removes a set of characters defined in <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">chars</span></code> from the string's beginning. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-rstrip"><span class="std std-ref">rstrip</span></a>.</p>
<p><strong>Note:</strong> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">chars</span></code> is not a prefix. Use <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-trim-prefix"><span class="std std-ref">trim_prefix</span></a> to remove a single prefix, rather than a set of characters.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-match"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>match</strong>(expr: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-match"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Does a simple expression match (also called "glob" or "globbing"), where <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">*</span></code> matches zero or more arbitrary characters and <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">?</span></code> matches any single character except a period (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">.</span></code>). An empty string or empty expression always evaluates to <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">false</span></code>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-matchn"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>matchn</strong>(expr: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-matchn"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Does a simple <strong>case-insensitive</strong> expression match, where <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">*</span></code> matches zero or more arbitrary characters and <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">?</span></code> matches any single character except a period (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">.</span></code>). An empty string or empty expression always evaluates to <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">false</span></code>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-md5-buffer"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray</span></a> <strong>md5_buffer</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-md5-buffer"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MD5">MD5 hash</a> of the string as a <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-md5-text"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>md5_text</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-md5-text"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MD5">MD5 hash</a> of the string as another <strong>String</strong>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-naturalcasecmp-to"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>naturalcasecmp_to</strong>(to: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-naturalcasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Performs a <strong>case-sensitive</strong>, <em>natural order</em> comparison to another string. Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-1</span></code> if less than, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">1</span></code> if greater than, or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">0</span></code> if equal. "Less than" or "greater than" are determined by the <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Unicode_characters">Unicode code points</a> of each string, which roughly matches the alphabetical order.</p>
<p>When used for sorting, natural order comparison orders sequences of numbers by the combined value of each digit as is often expected, instead of the single digit's value. A sorted sequence of numbered strings will be <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">["1",</span> <span class="pre">"2",</span> <span class="pre">"3",</span> <span class="pre">...]</span></code>, not <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">["1",</span> <span class="pre">"10",</span> <span class="pre">"2",</span> <span class="pre">"3",</span> <span class="pre">...]</span></code>.</p>
<p>With different string lengths, returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">1</span></code> if this string is longer than the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">to</span></code> string, or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-1</span></code> if shorter. Note that the length of empty strings is <em>always</em> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">0</span></code>.</p>
<p>To get a <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> result from a string comparison, use the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">==</span></code> operator instead. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-naturalnocasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">naturalnocasecmp_to</span></a>, <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-filecasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">filecasecmp_to</span></a>, and <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-nocasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">nocasecmp_to</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-naturalnocasecmp-to"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>naturalnocasecmp_to</strong>(to: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-naturalnocasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Performs a <strong>case-insensitive</strong>, <em>natural order</em> comparison to another string. Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-1</span></code> if less than, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">1</span></code> if greater than, or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">0</span></code> if equal. "Less than" or "greater than" are determined by the <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Unicode_characters">Unicode code points</a> of each string, which roughly matches the alphabetical order. Internally, lowercase characters are converted to uppercase for the comparison.</p>
<p>When used for sorting, natural order comparison orders sequences of numbers by the combined value of each digit as is often expected, instead of the single digit's value. A sorted sequence of numbered strings will be <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">["1",</span> <span class="pre">"2",</span> <span class="pre">"3",</span> <span class="pre">...]</span></code>, not <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">["1",</span> <span class="pre">"10",</span> <span class="pre">"2",</span> <span class="pre">"3",</span> <span class="pre">...]</span></code>.</p>
<p>With different string lengths, returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">1</span></code> if this string is longer than the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">to</span></code> string, or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-1</span></code> if shorter. Note that the length of empty strings is <em>always</em> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">0</span></code>.</p>
<p>To get a <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> result from a string comparison, use the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">==</span></code> operator instead. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-naturalcasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">naturalcasecmp_to</span></a>, <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-filenocasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">filenocasecmp_to</span></a>, and <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-casecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">casecmp_to</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-nocasecmp-to"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>nocasecmp_to</strong>(to: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-nocasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Performs a <strong>case-insensitive</strong> comparison to another string. Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-1</span></code> if less than, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">1</span></code> if greater than, or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">0</span></code> if equal. "Less than" or "greater than" are determined by the <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Unicode_characters">Unicode code points</a> of each string, which roughly matches the alphabetical order. Internally, lowercase characters are converted to uppercase for the comparison.</p>
<p>With different string lengths, returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">1</span></code> if this string is longer than the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">to</span></code> string, or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-1</span></code> if shorter. Note that the length of empty strings is <em>always</em> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">0</span></code>.</p>
<p>To get a <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> result from a string comparison, use the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">==</span></code> operator instead. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-casecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">casecmp_to</span></a>, <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-filenocasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">filenocasecmp_to</span></a>, and <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-naturalnocasecmp-to"><span class="std std-ref">naturalnocasecmp_to</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-num"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>num</strong>(number: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_float.html#class-float"><span class="std std-ref">float</span></a>, decimals: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> = -1) <abbr title="This method doesn&#39;t need an instance to be called, so it can be called directly using the class name.">static</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-num"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Converts a <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_float.html#class-float"><span class="std std-ref">float</span></a> to a string representation of a decimal number, with the number of decimal places specified in <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">decimals</span></code>.</p>
<p>If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">decimals</span></code> is <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-1</span></code> as by default, the string representation may only have up to 14 significant digits, with digits before the decimal point having priority over digits after.</p>
<p>Trailing zeros are not included in the string. The last digit is rounded, not truncated.</p>
<p><strong>Example:</strong></p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell30"><span></span><span class="nb nb-Type">String</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">num</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">3.141593</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w">     </span><span class="c1"># Returns "3.141593"</span>
<span class="nb nb-Type">String</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">num</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">3.141593</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w">  </span><span class="c1"># Returns "3.142"</span>
<span class="nb nb-Type">String</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">num</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">3.14159300</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="c1"># Returns "3.141593"</span>

<span class="c1"># Here, the last digit will be rounded up,</span>
<span class="c1"># which reduces the total digit count, since trailing zeros are removed:</span>
<span class="nb nb-Type">String</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">num</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">42.129999</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Returns "42.13"</span>

<span class="c1"># If `decimals` is not specified, the maximum number of significant digits is 14:</span>
<span class="nb nb-Type">String</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">num</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mf">0.0000012345432123454321</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w">     </span><span class="c1"># Returns "-0.00000123454321"</span>
<span class="nb nb-Type">String</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">num</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mf">10000.0000012345432123454321</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Returns "-10000.0000012345"</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell30">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>
</div>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-num-int64"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>num_int64</strong>(number: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>, base: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> = 10, capitalize_hex: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> = false) <abbr title="This method doesn&#39;t need an instance to be called, so it can be called directly using the class name.">static</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-num-int64"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Converts the given <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">number</span></code> to a string representation, with the given <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">base</span></code>.</p>
<p>By default, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">base</span></code> is set to decimal (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">10</span></code>). Other common bases in programming include binary (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">2</span></code>), <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Octal">octal</a> (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">8</span></code>), hexadecimal (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">16</span></code>).</p>
<p>If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">capitalize_hex</span></code> is <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code>, digits higher than 9 are represented in uppercase.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-num-scientific"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>num_scientific</strong>(number: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_float.html#class-float"><span class="std std-ref">float</span></a>) <abbr title="This method doesn&#39;t need an instance to be called, so it can be called directly using the class name.">static</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-num-scientific"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Converts the given <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">number</span></code> to a string representation, in scientific notation.</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-7-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-7-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" name="R0RTY3JpcHQ=" role="tab" tabindex="0">GDScript</button><button aria-controls="panel-7-QyM=" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-7-QyM=" name="QyM=" role="tab" tabindex="-1">C#</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-7-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-7-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" name="R0RTY3JpcHQ=" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell31"><span></span><span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">n</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mf">5.2e8</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w">                        </span><span class="c1"># Prints -520000000</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb nb-Type">String</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">num_scientific</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints -5.2e+08</span>

<span class="kt">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">n</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">-</span><span class="m">5.2</span><span class="n">e8f</span><span class="p">;</span>
