<p><strong>Note:</strong> In C#, this method is not implemented. To achieve similar results, see C#'s <a class="reference external" href="https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings">Standard numeric format strings</a></p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-num-uint64"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>num_uint64</strong>(number: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>, base: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> = 10, capitalize_hex: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> = false) <abbr title="This method doesn&#39;t need an instance to be called, so it can be called directly using the class name.">static</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-num-uint64"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Converts the given unsigned <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> to a string representation, with the given <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">base</span></code>.</p>
<p>By default, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">base</span></code> is set to decimal (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">10</span></code>). Other common bases in programming include binary (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">2</span></code>), <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Octal">octal</a> (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">8</span></code>), hexadecimal (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">16</span></code>).</p>
<p>If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">capitalize_hex</span></code> is <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code>, digits higher than 9 are represented in uppercase.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-pad-decimals"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>pad_decimals</strong>(digits: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-pad-decimals"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Formats the string representing a number to have an exact number of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">digits</span></code> <em>after</em> the decimal point.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-pad-zeros"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>pad_zeros</strong>(digits: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-pad-zeros"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Formats the string representing a number to have an exact number of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">digits</span></code> <em>before</em> the decimal point.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-path-join"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>path_join</strong>(file: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-path-join"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Concatenates <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">file</span></code> at the end of the string as a subpath, adding <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">/</span></code> if necessary.</p>
<p><strong>Example:</strong> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"this/is".path_join("path")</span> <span class="pre">==</span> <span class="pre">"this/is/path"</span></code>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-repeat"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>repeat</strong>(count: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-repeat"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Repeats this string a number of times. <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">count</span></code> needs to be greater than <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">0</span></code>. Otherwise, returns an empty string.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-replace"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>replace</strong>(what: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>, forwhat: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-replace"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Replaces all occurrences of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">what</span></code> inside the string with the given <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">forwhat</span></code>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-replacen"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>replacen</strong>(what: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>, forwhat: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-replacen"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Replaces all <strong>case-insensitive</strong> occurrences of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">what</span></code> inside the string with the given <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">forwhat</span></code>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-reverse"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>reverse</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-reverse"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the copy of this string in reverse order. This operation works on unicode codepoints, rather than sequences of codepoints, and may break things like compound letters or emojis.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-rfind"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>rfind</strong>(what: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>, from: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> = -1) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-rfind"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the index of the <strong>last</strong> occurrence of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">what</span></code> in this string, or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-1</span></code> if there are none. The search's start can be specified with <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">from</span></code>, continuing to the beginning of the string. This method is the reverse of <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-find"><span class="std std-ref">find</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-rfindn"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>rfindn</strong>(what: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>, from: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> = -1) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-rfindn"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the index of the <strong>last</strong> <strong>case-insensitive</strong> occurrence of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">what</span></code> in this string, or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-1</span></code> if there are none. The starting search index can be specified with <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">from</span></code>, continuing to the beginning of the string. This method is the reverse of <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-findn"><span class="std std-ref">findn</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-right"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>right</strong>(length: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-right"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the last <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">length</span></code> characters from the end of the string. If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">length</span></code> is negative, strips the first <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">length</span></code> characters from the string's beginning.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell33"><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Hello World!"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">right</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w">  </span><span class="c1"># Prints "ld!"</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Hello World!"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">right</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints "o World!"</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell33">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>
</div>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-rpad"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>rpad</strong>(min_length: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>, character: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> = " ") <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-rpad"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Formats the string to be at least <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">min_length</span></code> long, by adding <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">character</span></code>s to the right of the string, if necessary. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-lpad"><span class="std std-ref">lpad</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-rsplit"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedstringarray.html#class-packedstringarray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedStringArray</span></a> <strong>rsplit</strong>(delimiter: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> = "", allow_empty: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> = true, maxsplit: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> = 0) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-rsplit"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Splits the string using a <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">delimiter</span></code> and returns an array of the substrings, starting from the end of the string. The splits in the returned array appear in the same order as the original string. If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">delimiter</span></code> is an empty string, each substring will be a single character.</p>
<p>If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">allow_empty</span></code> is <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">false</span></code>, empty strings between adjacent delimiters are excluded from the array.</p>
<p>If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">maxsplit</span></code> is greater than <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">0</span></code>, the number of splits may not exceed <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">maxsplit</span></code>. By default, the entire string is split, which is mostly identical to <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-split"><span class="std std-ref">split</span></a>.</p>
<p><strong>Example:</strong></p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-8-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-8-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" name="R0RTY3JpcHQ=" role="tab" tabindex="0">GDScript</button><button aria-controls="panel-8-QyM=" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-8-QyM=" name="QyM=" role="tab" tabindex="-1">C#</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-8-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-8-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" name="R0RTY3JpcHQ=" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell34"><span></span><span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">some_string</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"One,Two,Three,Four"</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">some_array</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">some_string</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rsplit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">","</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="bp">true</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">some_array</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">size</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints 2</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">some_array</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span><span class="w">     </span><span class="c1"># Prints "One,Two,Three"</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">some_array</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span><span class="w">     </span><span class="c1"># Prints "Four"</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell34">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-8-QyM=" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-8-QyM=" name="QyM=" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-csharp notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell35"><span></span><span class="c1">// In C#, there is no String.RSplit() method.</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell35">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">

<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-rstrip"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>rstrip</strong>(chars: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-rstrip"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Removes a set of characters defined in <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">chars</span></code> from the string's end. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-lstrip"><span class="std std-ref">lstrip</span></a>.</p>
<p><strong>Note:</strong> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">chars</span></code> is not a suffix. Use <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-trim-suffix"><span class="std std-ref">trim_suffix</span></a> to remove a single suffix, rather than a set of characters.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-sha1-buffer"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray</span></a> <strong>sha1_buffer</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-sha1-buffer"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SHA-1">SHA-1</a> hash of the string as a <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-sha1-text"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>sha1_text</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-sha1-text"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SHA-1">SHA-1</a> hash of the string as another <strong>String</strong>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-sha256-buffer"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray</span></a> <strong>sha256_buffer</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-sha256-buffer"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SHA-2">SHA-256</a> hash of the string as a <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-sha256-text"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>sha256_text</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-sha256-text"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SHA-2">SHA-256</a> hash of the string as another <strong>String</strong>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-similarity"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_float.html#class-float"><span class="std std-ref">float</span></a> <strong>similarity</strong>(text: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-similarity"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the similarity index (<a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S%C3%B8rensen%E2%80%93Dice_coefficient">Sorensen-Dice coefficient</a>) of this string compared to another. A result of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">1.0</span></code> means totally similar, while <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">0.0</span></code> means totally dissimilar.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell36"><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"ABC123"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">similarity</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"ABC123"</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints 1.0</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"ABC123"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">similarity</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"XYZ456"</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints 0.0</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"ABC123"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">similarity</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"123ABC"</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints 0.8</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"ABC123"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">similarity</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"abc123"</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints 0.4</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell36">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>
</div>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-simplify-path"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>simplify_path</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-simplify-path"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>If the string is a valid file path, converts the string into a canonical path. This is the shortest possible path, without <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"./"</span></code>, and all the unnecessary <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">".."</span></code> and <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"/"</span></code>.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell37"><span></span><span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">simple_path</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"./path/to///../file"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">simplify_path</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">simple_path</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints "path/file"</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell37">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>
</div>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-split"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedstringarray.html#class-packedstringarray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedStringArray</span></a> <strong>split</strong>(delimiter: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> = "", allow_empty: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> = true, maxsplit: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> = 0) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-split"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Splits the string using a <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">delimiter</span></code> and returns an array of the substrings. If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">delimiter</span></code> is an empty string, each substring will be a single character. This method is the opposite of <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-join"><span class="std std-ref">join</span></a>.</p>
<p>If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">allow_empty</span></code> is <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">false</span></code>, empty strings between adjacent delimiters are excluded from the array.</p>
<p>If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">maxsplit</span></code> is greater than <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">0</span></code>, the number of splits may not exceed <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">maxsplit</span></code>. By default, the entire string is split.</p>
<p><strong>Example:</strong></p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-9-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-9-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" name="R0RTY3JpcHQ=" role="tab" tabindex="0">GDScript</button><button aria-controls="panel-9-QyM=" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-9-QyM=" name="QyM=" role="tab" tabindex="-1">C#</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-9-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-9-R0RTY3JpcHQ=" name="R0RTY3JpcHQ=" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell38"><span></span><span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">some_array</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"One,Two,Three,Four"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">","</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="bp">true</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">some_array</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">size</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints 3</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">some_array</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span><span class="w">     </span><span class="c1"># Prints "One"</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">some_array</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span><span class="w">     </span><span class="c1"># Prints "Two"</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">some_array</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">])</span><span class="w">     </span><span class="c1"># Prints "Three,Four"</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell38">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>

    </button></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-9-QyM=" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-9-QyM=" name="QyM=" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-csharp notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell39"><span></span><span class="c1">// C#'s `Split()` does not support the `maxsplit` parameter.</span>
<span class="kt">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">someArray</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s">"One,Two,Three"</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">","</span><span class="p">);</span>

<span class="n">GD</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">someArray</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="m">0</span><span class="p">]);</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">// Prints "One"</span>
<span class="n">GD</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">someArray</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="m">1</span><span class="p">]);</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">// Prints "Two"</span>
<span class="n">GD</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">someArray</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="m">2</span><span class="p">]);</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">// Prints "Three"</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell39">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>
</div>
</div></div>
<p><strong>Note:</strong> If you only need one substring from the array, consider using <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-get-slice"><span class="std std-ref">get_slice</span></a> which is faster. If you need to split strings with more complex rules, use the <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_regex.html#class-regex"><span class="std std-ref">RegEx</span></a> class instead.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-split-floats"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedfloat64array.html#class-packedfloat64array"><span class="std std-ref">PackedFloat64Array</span></a> <strong>split_floats</strong>(delimiter: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>, allow_empty: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> = true) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-split-floats"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Splits the string into floats by using a <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">delimiter</span></code> and returns a <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedfloat64array.html#class-packedfloat64array"><span class="std std-ref">PackedFloat64Array</span></a>.</p>
<p>If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">allow_empty</span></code> is <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">false</span></code>, empty or invalid <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_float.html#class-float"><span class="std std-ref">float</span></a> conversions between adjacent delimiters are excluded.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell40"><span></span><span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">a</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"1,2,4.5"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">split_floats</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">","</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w">         </span><span class="c1"># a is [1.0, 2.0, 4.5]</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">c</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"1| ||4.5"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">split_floats</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"|"</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w">        </span><span class="c1"># c is [1.0, 0.0, 0.0, 4.5]</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">b</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"1| ||4.5"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">split_floats</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"|"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="bp">false</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># b is [1.0, 4.5]</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell40">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>

</svg>
    </button></div>

<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-strip-edges"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>strip_edges</strong>(left: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> = true, right: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> = true) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-strip-edges"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Strips all non-printable characters from the beginning and the end of the string. These include spaces, tabulations (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">\t</span></code>), and newlines (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">\n</span></code> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">\r</span></code>).</p>
<p>If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">left</span></code> is <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">false</span></code>, ignores the string's beginning. Likewise, if <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">right</span></code> is <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">false</span></code>, ignores the string's end.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-strip-escapes"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>strip_escapes</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-strip-escapes"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Strips all escape characters from the string. These include all non-printable control characters of the first page of the ASCII table (values from 0 to 31), such as tabulation (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">\t</span></code>) and newline (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">\n</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">\r</span></code>) characters, but <em>not</em> spaces.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-substr"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>substr</strong>(from: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>, len: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> = -1) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-substr"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns part of the string from the position <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">from</span></code> with length <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">len</span></code>. If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">len</span></code> is <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">-1</span></code> (as by default), returns the rest of the string starting from the given position.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-to-ascii-buffer"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray</span></a> <strong>to_ascii_buffer</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-to-ascii-buffer"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Converts the string to an <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ASCII">ASCII</a>/Latin-1 encoded <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray</span></a>. This method is slightly faster than <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-to-utf8-buffer"><span class="std std-ref">to_utf8_buffer</span></a>, but replaces all unsupported characters with spaces. This is the inverse of <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray-method-get-string-from-ascii"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray.get_string_from_ascii</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-to-camel-case"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>to_camel_case</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-to-camel-case"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the string converted to <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">camelCase</span></code>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-to-float"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_float.html#class-float"><span class="std std-ref">float</span></a> <strong>to_float</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-to-float"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Converts the string representing a decimal number into a <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_float.html#class-float"><span class="std std-ref">float</span></a>. This method stops on the first non-number character, except the first decimal point (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">.</span></code>) and the exponent letter (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">e</span></code>). See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-valid-float"><span class="std std-ref">is_valid_float</span></a>.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell41"><span></span><span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">a</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"12.35"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_float</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w">  </span><span class="c1"># a is 12.35</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">b</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"1.2.3"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_float</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w">  </span><span class="c1"># b is 1.2</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">c</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"12xy3"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_float</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w">  </span><span class="c1"># c is 12.0</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">d</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"1e3"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_float</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w">    </span><span class="c1"># d is 1000.0</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">e</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Hello!"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_float</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># e is 0.0</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell41">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>
</div>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-to-int"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>to_int</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-to-int"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Converts the string representing an integer number into an <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>. This method removes any non-number character and stops at the first decimal point (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">.</span></code>). See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-valid-int"><span class="std std-ref">is_valid_int</span></a>.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell42"><span></span><span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">a</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"123"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_int</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w">    </span><span class="c1"># a is 123</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">b</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"x1y2z3"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_int</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># b is 123</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">c</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"-1.2.3"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_int</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># c is -1</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">d</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Hello!"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_int</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># d is 0</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell42">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>

<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-to-lower"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>to_lower</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-to-lower"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the string converted to <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">lowercase</span></code>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-to-pascal-case"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>to_pascal_case</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-to-pascal-case"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the string converted to <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">PascalCase</span></code>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-to-snake-case"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>to_snake_case</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-to-snake-case"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the string converted to <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">snake_case</span></code>.</p>
<p><strong>Note:</strong> Numbers followed by a <em>single</em> letter are not separated in the conversion to keep some words (such as "2D") together.</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">

<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-to-upper"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>to_upper</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-to-upper"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns the string converted to <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">UPPERCASE</span></code>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-to-utf8-buffer"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray</span></a> <strong>to_utf8_buffer</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-to-utf8-buffer"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Converts the string to a <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UTF-8">UTF-8</a> encoded <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray</span></a>. This method is slightly slower than <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-to-ascii-buffer"><span class="std std-ref">to_ascii_buffer</span></a>, but supports all UTF-8 characters. For most cases, prefer using this method. This is the inverse of <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray-method-get-string-from-utf8"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray.get_string_from_utf8</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-to-utf16-buffer"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray</span></a> <strong>to_utf16_buffer</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-to-utf16-buffer"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Converts the string to a <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UTF-16">UTF-16</a> encoded <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray</span></a>. This is the inverse of <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray-method-get-string-from-utf16"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray.get_string_from_utf16</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-to-utf32-buffer"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray</span></a> <strong>to_utf32_buffer</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-to-utf32-buffer"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Converts the string to a <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UTF-32">UTF-32</a> encoded <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray</span></a>. This is the inverse of <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray-method-get-string-from-utf32"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray.get_string_from_utf32</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-to-wchar-buffer"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray</span></a> <strong>to_wchar_buffer</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-to-wchar-buffer"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Converts the string to a <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wide_character">wide character</a> (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">wchar_t</span></code>, UTF-16 on Windows, UTF-32 on other platforms) encoded <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray</span></a>. This is the inverse of <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_packedbytearray.html#class-packedbytearray-method-get-string-from-wchar"><span class="std std-ref">PackedByteArray.get_string_from_wchar</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-trim-prefix"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>trim_prefix</strong>(prefix: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-trim-prefix"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>

<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-trim-suffix"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>trim_suffix</strong>(suffix: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-trim-suffix"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Removes the given <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">suffix</span></code> from the end of the string, or returns the string unchanged.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-unicode-at"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a> <strong>unicode_at</strong>(at: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-unicode-at"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>

<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-uri-decode"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>uri_decode</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-uri-decode"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Decodes the string from its URL-encoded format. This method is meant to properly decode the parameters in a URL when receiving an HTTP request. See also <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-uri-encode"><span class="std std-ref">uri_encode</span></a>.</p>

<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-validate-filename"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>validate_filename</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects.
