<p>Returns a copy of the string with all characters that are not allowed in <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-is-valid-filename"><span class="std std-ref">is_valid_filename</span></a> replaced with underscores.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-validate-node-name"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>validate_node_name</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-validate-node-name"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns a copy of the string with all characters that are not allowed in <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_node.html#class-node-property-name"><span class="std std-ref">Node.name</span></a> (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">.</span></code> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">:</span></code> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">@</span></code> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">/</span></code> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"</span></code> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">%</span></code>) replaced with underscores.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-xml-escape"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>xml_escape</strong>(escape_quotes: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> = false) <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-xml-escape"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns a copy of the string with special characters escaped using the XML standard. If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">escape_quotes</span></code> is <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code>, the single quote (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">'</span></code>) and double quote (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">"</span></code>) characters are also escaped.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-method" id="class-string-method-xml-unescape"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>xml_unescape</strong>() <abbr title="This method has no side effects. It doesn&#39;t modify any of the instance&#39;s member variables.">const</abbr> <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-method-xml-unescape"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns a copy of the string with escaped characters replaced by their meanings according to the XML standard.</p>
</section>
<hr class="classref-section-separator docutils">
<section class="classref-descriptions-group" id="operator-descriptions">
<h2>Operator Descriptions<a class="headerlink" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#operator-descriptions" title="Permalink to this headline">Â¶</a></h2>
<p class="classref-operator" id="class-string-operator-neq-string"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>operator !=</strong>(right: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-operator-neq-string"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if both strings do not contain the same sequence of characters.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-operator" id="class-string-operator-neq-stringname"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>operator !=</strong>(right: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_stringname.html#class-stringname"><span class="std std-ref">StringName</span></a>) <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-operator-neq-stringname"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if this <strong>String</strong> is not equivalent to the given <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_stringname.html#class-stringname"><span class="std std-ref">StringName</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-operator" id="class-string-operator-mod-variant"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>operator %</strong>(right: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_variant.html#class-variant"><span class="std std-ref">Variant</span></a>) <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-operator-mod-variant"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Formats the <strong>String</strong>, replacing the placeholders with one or more parameters. To pass multiple parameters, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">right</span></code> needs to be an <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_array.html#class-array"><span class="std std-ref">Array</span></a>.</p>
<div class="highlight-gdscript notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre id="codecell49"><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"I caught </span><span class="si">%d</span><span class="s2"> fishes!"</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">%</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints "I caught 2 fishes!"</span>

<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">my_message</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Travelling to </span><span class="si">%s</span><span class="s2">, at </span><span class="si">%2.2f</span><span class="s2"> km/h."</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">location</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Deep Valley"</span>
<span class="k">var</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">speed</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mf">40.3485</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">my_message</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">%</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">location</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">speed</span><span class="p">])</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1"># Prints "Travelling to Deep Valley, at 40.35 km/h."</span>
</pre><button class="copybtn o-tooltip--left" data-tooltip="Copy" data-clipboard-target="#codecell49">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-copy" width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="#000000" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <title>Copy to clipboard</title>
  <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path>
  <rect x="8" y="8" width="12" height="12" rx="2"></rect>
  <path d="M16 8v-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-8a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v8a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2"></path>
</svg>
    </button></div>
</div>
<p>For more information, see the <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/tutorials/scripting/gdscript/gdscript_format_string.html"><span class="doc">GDScript format strings</span></a> tutorial.</p>
<p><strong>Note:</strong> In C#, this operator is not available. Instead, see <a class="reference external" href="https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/tokens/interpolated">how to interpolate strings with "$"</a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-operator" id="class-string-operator-sum-string"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>operator +</strong>(right: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-operator-sum-string"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Appends <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">right</span></code> at the end of this <strong>String</strong>, also known as a string concatenation.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-operator" id="class-string-operator-sum-stringname"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>operator +</strong>(right: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_stringname.html#class-stringname"><span class="std std-ref">StringName</span></a>) <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-operator-sum-stringname"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Appends <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">right</span></code> at the end of this <strong>String</strong>, returning a <strong>String</strong>. This is also known as a string concatenation.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-operator" id="class-string-operator-lt-string"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>operator &lt;</strong>(right: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-operator-lt-string"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if the left <strong>String</strong> comes before <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">right</span></code> in <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Unicode_characters">Unicode order</a>, which roughly matches the alphabetical order. Useful for sorting.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-operator" id="class-string-operator-lte-string"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>operator &lt;=</strong>(right: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-operator-lte-string"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if the left <strong>String</strong> comes before <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">right</span></code> in <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Unicode_characters">Unicode order</a>, which roughly matches the alphabetical order, or if both are equal.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-operator" id="class-string-operator-eq-string"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>operator ==</strong>(right: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-operator-eq-string"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if both strings contain the same sequence of characters.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-operator" id="class-string-operator-eq-stringname"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>operator ==</strong>(right: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_stringname.html#class-stringname"><span class="std std-ref">StringName</span></a>) <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-operator-eq-stringname"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if this <strong>String</strong> is equivalent to the given <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_stringname.html#class-stringname"><span class="std std-ref">StringName</span></a>.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-operator" id="class-string-operator-gt-string"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>operator &gt;</strong>(right: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-operator-gt-string"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if the left <strong>String</strong> comes after <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">right</span></code> in <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Unicode_characters">Unicode order</a>, which roughly matches the alphabetical order. Useful for sorting.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-operator" id="class-string-operator-gte-string"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_bool.html#class-bool"><span class="std std-ref">bool</span></a> <strong>operator &gt;=</strong>(right: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a>) <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-operator-gte-string"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> if the left <strong>String</strong> comes after <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">right</span></code> in <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Unicode_characters">Unicode order</a>, which roughly matches the alphabetical order, or if both are equal.</p>
<hr class="classref-item-separator docutils">
<p class="classref-operator" id="class-string-operator-idx-int"><a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string"><span class="std std-ref">String</span></a> <strong>operator []</strong>(index: <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_int.html#class-int"><span class="std std-ref">int</span></a>) <a class="reference internal" href="https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_string.html#class-string-operator-idx-int"><span class="std std-ref">ðŸ”—</span></a></p>
<p>Returns a new <strong>String</strong> that only contains the character at <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">index</span></code>. Indices start from <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">0</span></code>. If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">index</span></code> is greater or equal to <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">0</span></code>, the character is fetched starting from the beginning of the string. If <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">index</span></code> is a negative value, it is fetched starting from the end. Accessing a string out-of-bounds will cause a run-time error, pausing the project execution if run from the editor.</p>
</section>
</section>

        <!--?lit$509484830$-->en</span> <!--?lit$509484830$--><span><!--?lit$509484830$--><svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" data-prefix="fas" data-icon="code-branch" class="svg-inline--fa fa-code-branch icon" role="img" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 448 512"><path fill="currentColor" d="M80 104a24 24 0 1 0 0-48 24 24 0 1 0 0 48zm80-24c0 32.8-19.7 61-48 73.3l0 87.8c18.8-10.9 40.7-17.1 64-17.1l96 0c35.3 0 64-28.7 64-64l0-6.7C307.7 141 288 112.8 288 80c0-44.2 35.8-80 80-80s80 35.8 80 80c0 32.8-19.7 61-48 73.3l0 6.7c0 70.7-57.3 128-128 128l-96 0c-35.3 0-64 28.7-64 64l0 6.7c28.3 12.3 48 40.5 48 73.3c0 44.2-35.8 80-80 80s-80-35.8-80-80c0-32.8 19.7-61 48-73.3l0-6.7 0-198.7C19.7 141 0 112.8 0 80C0 35.8 35.8 0 80 0s80 35.8 80 80zm232 0a24 24 0 1 0 -48 0 24 24 0 1 0 48 0zM80 456a24 24 0 1 0 0-48 24 24 0 1 0 0 48z"></path></svg> <!--?lit$509484830$-->stable</span>
      </header>
    
        <main class=" closed ">
          <!--?lit$509484830$-->
      <dl class="languages">
        <dt>Languages</dt>
        <!--?lit$509484830$--><!----><dd><!--?lit$509484830$--><a
